code:
classDiagram
%% ========= Classes =========
class Customer {
  +string customerId
  +string segment
  +date signupDate
  +bool isActive
}

class Subscription {
  +string planId
  +string planName
  +date startDate
  +date endDate
  +float monthlyFee
}

class Interaction {
  +string interactionId
  +date date
  +string channel  // call, email, app, web
  +string type     // support, usage, complaint
  +int durationSec
}

class Dataset {
  +int nRows
  +int nFeatures
  +load(source)
  +split(trainPct)
}

class FeatureEngineer {
  +list features
  +buildFeatures(dataset)
}

class ChurnModel {
  +string modelType    // e.g., XGBoost, Logistic
  +float threshold
  +train(dataset)
  +predict(dataset) : Prediction[]
  +save(path)
  +load(path)
}

class Prediction {
  +string customerId
  +float probability
  +bool willChurn
  +date scoredAt
}

class Evaluation {
  +float auc
  +float precision
  +float recall
  +float f1
  +evaluate(model, dataset)
}

class Dashboard {
  +renderPredictions(predictions)
  +renderMetrics(eval)
}

%% ========= Relationships =========
Customer "1" --> "*" Subscription : has
Customer "1" --> "*" Interaction : generates
Dataset "1" o-- "*" Customer : includes
Dataset "1" o-- "*" Interaction : includes
FeatureEngineer "1" --> "1" Dataset : transforms
ChurnModel "1" --> "1" Dataset : trains on
ChurnModel "1" --> "*" Prediction : outputs
Evaluation "1" --> "1" ChurnModel : assesses
Evaluation "1" --> "1" Dataset : using
Dashboard "1" --> "*" Prediction : visualizes
Dashboard "1" --> "1" Evaluation : shows metrics
